author: Greg Stephens
title: Greg Stephens
text: Received our furniture yesterday and it shipped in 5 separate boxes, done quite nicely..!! But upon taking the plastic wrapping that kept all the boxes together on the pallet, I noticed that one of the boxes had been punctured and tore a hole in the bottom of the recliner. Looked like a fork of a forklift. So, I called 4Seating as soon as I noticed and talked with Richard Valdez and he told me what I needed to do, as well as sending me an email, with everything I needed to do. Which is as simple as a process could be. The next day I sent pictures of the the damaged piece and the paperwork that was emailed to me. I have a new chair on its way to replace the damaged one.!! Couldn't be more pleased with the service I have received from 4Seating and Richard Valdez..!!! :-)
